answers.answer: Not sure what its called but I do know numbness/tinglyness is normal during pregnancy. Never heard about it in the face but arms, legs, ect its normal.
If got it all in my wrist and arms I can't lift or grasp.... I have to wear two carpal tunnel splints smh. The face thing got me super nervous though

I would give your doc a call in the morning. I know tingling can be a sign of swelling and swelling in the face and neck isnt good. but if you dont think you are swelling then you should be ok because like the first person said tingling is a normal thing in pregnancy but just to be on the safe side you should call and check with your doctor.
Nooo!!! Lol ok will do ladies thank u
That's a major sign of preeclampsia... definitely call ur doc to be safe

question: My face feels tingley almost swollen like but I'm sure its not or at least not yet.... What could this be?
title: tingley face?
